CanOnlyTradeIfUnlocked(bool).details: Error which ensures the VAMM is unlocked

ExpectedOppositeSigns(int256,int256).details: The two values were expected to have oppostite sigs, but do not

ExpectedSqrtPriceZeroBeforeInit(uint160).details: Error which is reverted if the sqrt price of the vamm is non-zero before a vamm is initialized

IRSNotionalAmountSpecifiedMustBeNonZero(.details: Error which ensures the amount of notional specified when initiating an IRS contract (via the swap function in the vamm) is non-zero

LiquidityDeltaMustBePositiveInBurn(uint1.details: Error which ensures the liquidity delta is positive if a given LP wishes to burn liquidity in the vamm

LiquidityDeltaMustBePositiveInMint(uint1.details: Error which ensures the liquidity delta is positive if a given LP wishes to mint further liquidity in the vamm

NotEnoughFunds(uint256,uint256).details: There are not enough funds available for the requested operation

OnlyMarginEngine().details: only the margin engine can run a certain function

params.amount: The amount of liquidity to burn
params.recipient: The address for which the liquidity will be created
params.tickLower: The lower tick of the position in which to add liquidity
params.tickUpper: The upper tick of the position in which to add liquidity

params.tickLower: The lower tick of the position
params.tickUpper: The upper tick of the position

returns.feeGrowthInsideX128: Fee Growth Inside given tick range
returns.fixedTokenGrowthInsideX128: Fixed Token Growth inside the given tick range
returns.variableTokenGrowthInsideX128: Variable Token Growth inside the given tick range

initializeVAMM(uint160).details: not locked because it initializes unlocked

params.amount: The amount of liquidity to mint
params.recipient: The address for which the liquidity will be created
params.tickLower: The lower tick of the position in which to add liquidity
params.tickUpper: The upper tick of the position in which to add liquidity

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.params: SwapParams necessary to initiate an Interest Rate Swap

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateProtocolFees(uint256).details: can only be done via the collectProtocol function of the parent AMM of the vamm

feeGrowthGlobalX128.details: This value can overflow the uint256

fixedTokenGrowthGlobalX128.details: This value can overflow the uint256

maxLiquidityPerTick.details: This parameter should be enforced per tick (when setting) to prevent liquidity from overflowing a uint128 at any point, and also prevents out-of-range liquidity from being used to prevent adding in-range liquidity to the vamm
maxLiquidityPerTick.return: The max amount of liquidity per tick

returns._0: The max amount of liquidity per tick

protocolFees.details: Protocol fees will never exceed uint256

tickSpacing.details: Ticks can only be used at multiples of this value, minimum of 1 and always positive e.g.: a tickSpacing of 3 means ticks can be initialized every 3rd tick, i.e., ..., -6, -3, 0, 3, 6, ... This value is an int24 to avoid casting even though it is always positive.

ticks.return: liquidityGross the total amount of position liquidity that uses the vamm either as tick lower or tick upper, liquidityNet how much liquidity changes when the vamm price crosses the tick, feeGrowthOutsideX128 the fee growth on the other side of the tick from the current tick in underlying token i.e. if liquidityGross is greater than 0. In addition, these values are only relative.

returns.liquidityGross: the total amount of position liquidity that uses the vamm either as tick lower or tick upper, liquidityNet how much liquidity changes when the vamm price crosses the tick, feeGrowthOutsideX128 the fee growth on the other side of the tick from the current tick in underlying token i.e. if liquidityGross is greater than 0. In addition, these values are only relative.

unlocked.return: The boolean, true if the vamm is unlocked

returns._0: The boolean, true if the vamm is unlocked

returns.sqrtPriceX96: The current price of the pool as a sqrt(variableToken/fixedToken) Q64.96 value
returns.tick: The current tick of the vamm, i.e. according to the last tick transition that was run.

variableTokenGrowthGlobalX128.details: This value can overflow the uint256

AmountSignsSame().notice: amount0 and amount1 must have different signs

PRBMathSD59x18__DivInputTooSmall().notice: Emitted when one of the inputs is MIN_SD59x18.

PRBMathSD59x18__DivOverflow(uint256).notice: Emitted when one of the intermediary unsigned results overflows SD59x18.

PRBMathSD59x18__FromIntOverflow(int256).notice: Emitted when converting a basic integer to the fixed-point format overflows SD59x18.

PRBMathSD59x18__FromIntUnderflow(int256).notice: Emitted when converting a basic integer to the fixed-point format underflows SD59x18.

PRBMathSD59x18__MulInputTooSmall().notice: Emitted when one of the inputs is MIN_SD59x18.

PRBMathSD59x18__MulOverflow(uint256).notice: Emitted when the intermediary absolute result overflows SD59x18.

PRBMathUD60x18__FromUintOverflow(uint256.notice: Emitted when converting a basic integer to the fixed-point format format overflows UD60x18.

PRBMath__MulDivFixedPointOverflow(uint25.notice: Emitted when the result overflows uint256.

PRBMath__MulDivOverflow(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when the result overflows uint256.

burn(address,int24,int24,uint128).notice: removes liquidity given recipient/tickLower/tickUpper of the position

computeGrowthInside(int24,int24).notice: Computes the current fixed and variable token growth inside a given tick range given the current tick in the vamm

feeGrowthGlobalX128().notice: The fee growth in wei, collected per unit of liquidity for the entire life of the vamm

fixedTokenGrowthGlobalX128().notice: The fixed token growth in wei, accumulated per unit of liquidity for the entire life of the vamm

liquidity().notice: The currently in range liquidity available to the vamm

maxLiquidityPerTick().notice: The maximum amount of position liquidity that can use any tick in the range

mint(address,int24,int24,uint128).notice: Adds liquidity for the given recipient/tickLower/tickUpper position

protocolFees().notice: The amount underlying token that are owed to the protocol

setFeeProtocol(uint8).notice: Function that sets the feeProtocol of the vamm

tickBitmap(int16).notice: Returns 256 packed tick initialized boolean values. See TickBitmap for more information

ticks(int24).notice: Look up information about a specific tick in the amm

updateProtocolFees(uint256).notice: Updates internal accounting to reflect a collection of protocol fees. The actual transfer of fees must happen separately in the AMM

variableTokenGrowthGlobalX128().notice: The variable token growth in wei, accumulated per unit of liquidity for the entire life of the vamm
